name: Mozzarella Puffs
author: Arreinia Grubb
summary: Buttermilk biscuits are stuffed with mozzarella cheese, covered in pizza sauce and baked to golden perfection.
ingredients: 1 (7.5 ounce) package refrigerated buttermilk biscuit dough
3 ounces mozzarella cheese, cut into 3/4 inch cubes
directions: Preheat oven to 375  degrees F (190 degrees C)
Make an indentation in the top of each uncooked biscuit
Fill indentations with oregano and a mozzarella cube
Pinch the dough around the mozzarella cubes
Place the biscuits, pinched side down, on a medium, ungreased baking sheet
Bake in the preheated oven 10 to 12 minutes, or until golden brown
